abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Porygon-Z LV.X from your hand onto your Active Porygon-Z, you may discard all of your opponent's Special Energy cards in play./Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for up to any 2 cards and shuffle your deck afterward. Then, put those cards on top of your deck in any order. This power can't be used if Porygon-Z is affected by a Special Condition.
